name: EndeavourOS
description: EndeavourOS is a user-friendly Arch-based Linux distribution that aims to ease the installation and setup of a fully customizable Arch environment.

sections.title: Early Years
sections.text: EndeavourOS was launched in 2019 as the spiritual successor to Antergos, following its discontinuation. It sought to simplify Arch installation without hiding its complexity.

sections.title: Growth and Development
sections.text: EndeavourOS grew rapidly thanks to its strong community, graphical installer (Calamares), and friendly documentation while remaining close to pure Arch.

sections.title: Current Status
sections.text: EndeavourOS is now a leading Arch-based distro for users who want an accessible entry point to Arch with the freedom to customize everything.

sections.title: Arch Without Hassle
sections.text: EndeavourOS bridges the gap between user-friendliness and Arch power by offering preconfigured desktop environments and a guided installation process.
